name: Dice Defender
description:
Dice Defender made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam Made by Enkrypt in 48 hours

This is a bullet hell in which you must defend yourself from evil Dice! As the dice numbers get higher, the enemies get tougher, and have special abilities!

Earn coins by killing enemies, and use them to roll. Rolling grants you a buff, but also a debuff! Buffs and debuffs have tiers, 1-3. The higher the tier, the better the buff, but also the worse the debuff!

This game should work for most resolutions, however it has only been tested for 1920x1080 and 3440x1440.

Thanks for playing - Enkrypt

17/07/2022
